alert.note: Alert for Edgar (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 06 at 1:24AM CST until March 06 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN EDGAR AND NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 123 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oliver, or near Marshall, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dennison around 130 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Vermilion. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 145 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
